name: USRegionalHoliday
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: u. s. regional holiday
des:
In the United States, each state has regional holidays in addition to federal holidays.
Selecting a state and saying a date, the skill answers regional holiday along with federal holiday.
When launch or reset, no state setting and return federal holidays only.

Select a state(example): select New York 
Say a date(example): January 1st, Today
Reset(remove state setting): reset
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
